ref: 9777 madana3 m. ʻ the plant Vanguiera spinosa ʼ Suśr., madanaka -- m. ʻ Artemisia indica ʼ (euphem. for damanaka -- s.v. *dramaṇa -- ?) lex.
Pk. mayaṇa -- phala -- n. ʻ name of a fruit ʼ;
S. meṇ -- phalu m. ʻ Randia dumetorum ʼ;
P. maiṇā ʻ the plant Medicago denticulata (gathered for fodder and as a potherb) ʼ, C
P. mainī f. ʻ the plant Trigonella polyserrata ʼ;
Ku. maiṇo ʻ a vegetable used for poisoning fish ʼ;
N. mainkã̄ṛā ʻ the creeper Toddalia aculeata ʼ, main -- kāṭh ʻ Tetrameles nudiflora ʼ;
B. maynā ʻ the thorny bush Vanguiera spinosa ʼ;
Or. mayaṇa, maeṇa ʻ the bushes Randia dumetorum and R. longispina (used medicinally) ʼ;
H. main m. ʻ V. spinosa ʼ, main -- phal m. ʻ Nux vomica ʼ.
